EmailTemplate.subject: Announcing The All Things Pivotal Podcast Program
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello!
We are very excited to announce the “All Things Pivotal” Podcast program on pivotal.io/podcasts <http://www.pivotal.io/podcasts>. Weekly episodes hosted by Simon Elisha <https://twitter.com/simon_elisha>, Pivotal CTO and field engineering manager, will cover topics at the intersection of cloud platform, big data and analytics, agile development and DevOps. Episode #1 "All About Pivotal" is now available featuring what customers talk about and the capabilities they want to use.
Episode topics will include:
- How does pair programming work? - How deploying software on Pivotal CF can make delivering application availability easier than ever before - Comparing big data versus fast data - What does an in-memory database bring to the table? - How can using Pivotal CF improve operational performance? - Where does Platform-as-a-Service fit into the world of DevOps? - What is a 12-factor app? Why is this an important thing to know about? - How to connect a service to Pivotal CF - The latest Pivotal product and other news
Since podcasts are portable, we hope you’ll take the opportunity to download “All Things Pivotal” and listen whenever convenient. Subscribe here <http://www.pivotal.io/podcasts>.
Have a topic you would like to see covered? Share your feedback with us by email: podcast@pivotal.io <mailto:podcast@pivotal.io>.
Thanks! The Pivotal Team
